VEC.Q: How many series are represented in this area chart?

SRP.Q: What is the vertical (above/below) relationship of the area representing The Cozy Nook relative to Sky High Cafe?
SRP.A: The Cozy Nook is {above} Sky High Cafe in the vertical direction.

VPR.Q: Which series contributes the largest portion to the total food safety index?
VPR.A: The series with the largest contribution is {The Cozy Nook}.

VPR.Q: Which series contributes the smallest portion to the total food safety index?
VPR.A: The series with the smallest contribution is {Crimson Plate}.

VE.Q: What is Sky High Cafe's Food Safety Index in 1997?
VE.A: Sky High Cafe's food safety index in 1997 is {110.59} index.

VE.Q: What is The Cozy Nook's Food Safety Index in 2020?
VE.A: The Cozy Nook's food safety index in 2020 is {999.42} index.

VE.Q: What is The Golden Spoon's Food Safety Index in 2013?
VE.A: The Golden Spoon's food safety index in 2013 is {223.25} index.

VE.Q: What are the food safety index of Crimson Plate, Sky High Cafe, and Stellar Bistro in 2002?
VE.A: Crimson Plate's food safety index is {45.45} index, Sky High Cafe's food safety index is {178.77} index, Stellar Bistro's food safety index is {105.82} index.

EVJ.Q: What is the global minimum Food Safety Index in the area chart?
EVJ.A: The global minimum food safety index is {6.60} index.

EVJ.Q: What is the global maximum Food Safety Index in the area chart?
EVJ.A: The global maximum food safety index is {999.42} index.

EVJ.Q: What is the highest Food Safety Index level recorded for Crimson Plate?
EVJ.A: Crimson Plate reached approximately {92.26} index in {1995}.

EVJ.Q: What is the lowest Food Safety Index level recorded for Crimson Plate?
EVJ.A: Crimson Plate's lowest recorded level is approximately {6.60} index in {2019}.

SC.Q: What is the average total Food Safety Index?
SC.A: The average total food safety index is {1081.77} index.

NF.Q: Which years did the total Food Safety Index exceed 1303.76 index? Please list the years and corresponding total values.
Which years did the total Food Safety Index go below 658.25 index? Please list the years and corresponding total values.
Which years did the total Food Safety Index fall between 931.95 and 1030.06 index? Please list the years and corresponding total values.

NC.Q: Was the total Food Safety Index in 2006 higher or lower than in 2016?
NC.A: The total food safety index in 2006 was {lower} than in 2016.

NC.Q: Between 2006 and 2017, did the total Food Safety Index experience a larger or smaller change than between 2006 and 2007?
NC.A: The change in total food safety index between 2006 and 2017 was {larger} than between 2006 and 2007.

NC.Q: Was the total Food Safety Index in 1998 higher or lower than in 2003?
NC.A: The total food safety index in 1998 was {lower} than in 2003.

NC.Q: Between 1997 and 2017, did the total Food Safety Index experience a larger or smaller change than between 1997 and 2015?
NC.A: The change in total food safety index between 1997 and 2017 was {larger} than between 1997 and 2015.

MSR.Q: Which series has the largest cumulative area in this area chart?
MSR.A: {The Cozy Nook} has the largest cumulative area.

VA.Q: To reduce the 'waving' visual effect in the area chart, reorder the layers by end value and list the labels from top to bottom after sorting.
VA.A: The reordered layer order from top to bottom is: {Crimson Plate, Stellar Bistro, The Golden Spoon, Sky High Cafe, The Cozy Nook}.
